verses.name: Habakkuk 3:5
verses.text: Before him went the pestilence, and burning coals went forth at his feet.

verses.name: Habakkuk 3:6
verses.text: He stood, and measured the earth: he beheld, and drove asunder the nations; and the everlasting mountains were scattered, the perpetual hills did bow: his ways are everlasting.

verses.name: Habakkuk 3:7
verses.text: I saw the tents of Cushan in affliction: and the curtains of the land of Midian did tremble.

verses.name: Habakkuk 3:8
verses.text: Was the Lord displeased against the rivers? was thine anger against the rivers? was thy wrath against the sea, that thou didst ride upon thine horses and thy chariots of salvation?
